attributes.action: Dear Boris, please postpone Brexit! Nobody wants a no-deal Brexit on October 31.
attributes.additional_details: We please everybody who undersigned this petition to register on our website http://www.together-against-brexit.co.uk to support us in our fight against Brexit. Furthermore, we please you to check our website regularly in the following weeks to participate in our events to end this tragedy on Brexit.Only together we can be loud enough and visible on the streets to be heard.With silence we will not wake the parliament up, some MPs are still blind on both eyes therefore support us !! XOXO
attributes.background: The people who undersigned this petition would like you to revoke Article50 and cancel Brexit because we already have the best deal to stay in the EU. Nobody voted for a no-deal Brexit during the EU referendum. Stop gambling with our future.We only support a general election on Thursday 7 May 2020.
